subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Huskies, who have not lost since 2008, matched the N.C.A.A. Division I basketball winning streak set by the U.C.L.A. men from 1971 to 1974.
snippet: The Huskies, who have not lost since 2008, matched the N.C.A.A. Division I basketball winning streak set by the U.C.L.A. men from 1971 to 1974.
